autonomousOperation.description: Defines how Pinokio AutoGPT operates independently, making decisions, and executing tasks without human intervention.

decisionExecution.description: Executes decisions based on the current knowledge base and state.

taskExecution.description: Executes tasks based on the decisions made.

operationLogging.description: Logs all autonomous operation activities for tracking and auditing purposes.

activityLogging.description: Logs all autonomous operation activities in real-time.

auditLogging.description: Logs all autonomous operation activities in a format suitable for auditing.

errorHandling.description: Handles any errors or exceptions that occur during autonomous operation.

exceptionCatching.description: Catches and logs exceptions that occur during autonomous operation.

errorResolution.description: Attempts to resolve errors or exceptions and return to normal operation.
